title: 2 New taliyah Skin
body:
We all know Taliyah is strong and keep getting Nerf over an over, but this doesn't make people stop playing her

She was released on 18 May 2016 and to be honest I don't see her current skin that good, though particle effects are nice but it doesn't appeal to many players to be honest, that's why I see normal Taliyah most of the time, and it is much better than ice one

I don't know whether you guys (Riot) will like these ideas or not but I am gona give a go for this one

1st skin idea

Flaming Queen Taliyah (Red Flame Fire Taliyah)

Her Looks = Fire+earth ( this means despite being brown in color I would prefer flames coming out of her shoulders and legs )

Passive: using a fire bard or using normal board as current but we could see lava underneath the board 

Q     ([Based on her looks], When she Q it will seems flames coming out  Don't u think it would be much cooler ? )

W:  While casting W, we could see the ground is shaky and a bit of craks on it and while it knocks you up there is a force of lava doing that thing :)


E While she caste E, instead of  seeing unworked ground how about a lava on ground ? like there is no ground when she cast E and we could See lava boiling up and coming out from ground ? here is an example [](http://www.bing.com/images/search?q=lava+ground&view=detailv2&&id=D3426F54549AD568EEE307776F6464E886FDE44E&selectedIndex=1&ccid=YRd0pQNS&simid=608025322759587315&thid=OIP.M611774a50352a3813a8d2c24a798d714o0&ajaxhist=0)

R= Flammable wall ( 2 things in her R)
1st We can either use a mix of her ground + fire and it will look like there is a fire on top of the ground 
Or
a flammable fire wall


2nd Skin Project Project Taliyah

Because her Q W E R  Suits better as a project skin totally like a Project skin skills 


please let me know about my Idea Riot 


Regards

IndianGamer
 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
People are stopping playing her tho?

She has a 3.5% pick rate (low), and out of 130 champions she is the 27th LEAST played, (even Zilean is played more than her).

The only reason she is getting nerfed is becasue her W/E combo is too fast now (it was fine before they uneccesarily changed her W)

I still play Taliyah though, she is still one of my mains and i love her always, (still salty about the W change tho) 


While she isn't in immediate need of skins (Syndra didn't get a 2nd skin for 2 years after release) and while i personally like the ice one (considering it has new quotes and everything) I'm always open to new Taliyah skins

and a magma one would be cool! provided it was tooooo red like volcanic wukong...

Im not sure about 'PROJECT:' I get the feeling that the PROJECT: skin line excludes mages (maybe for whatever reason, magic doesn't work once upgraded to project), as none of the current project skins involve magic and are all 'physical skill' champions with swords or bows. So if thats the theme, i doubt mages will be included.

I also think a Coral/Atlantis would be epic too

I personally like the fire/magma one 

and if we are talking about syndra she has a lot of skins, and she got a recent new skin which is snow day Syndra 

also it doesn't matter how many people playing her, I still play her I dotn like W but I can still manage to land 80% of mine at correct places 


the only reason people don't play her bcoz they think she is weak, but she need skill to play bcoz her qwe is enough to kill any lane champion 
but anyways not every 1 can play skill champs though, her snow skin is not really appealing :/ and specially loading screen she look ugly as F -.- I prefer normal face tbh :/
